titleStmt.title: The disarmers dexterities examined. In a second defence of the treatise of schisme. / By H. Hammond, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher, for Richard Royston at the Angel in Ivy Lane,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob: 22: 1655"; "October." (crossed out); the 6 in imprint date is crossed out.
